pages.title: Pickling cucumbers
pages.text: You will need a glass jar, bucket of water, salt, dill flowers, garlic and 10 cucumbers.Click on the jar with a water bucket, then with salt, dill, garlic.Then cucumbers should be placed in 10 times.All the step will be commented by a player in the action bar.When you'll finish with cooking, leave the jar for a while.
